attributes.action: force a change to the horrible 2012 olympics logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's pink, not even the "youth of today" are getting it.  I believe that the logo for the 2012 olympics should be changed.  It does not respect Britain, London or the Olympics themselves.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "force a change to the horrible 2012 olympics logo."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16487


Prime Minister's Office
